metadata.title: CVE-2018-14767 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In Kamailio before 5.0.7 and 5.1.x before 5.1.4, a crafted SIP message witha double "To" header and an empty "To" tag causes a segmentation fault andcrash. The reason is missing input validation in the"build_res_buf_from_sip_req" core function. This could result in denial ofservice and potentially the execution of arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: kamailio package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
